title: US VP Harris embraces call for war crimes probe of Russia - The Associated Press - en Español
content: US VP Harris embraces call for war crimes probe of Russia  The Associated Press - en EspañolView Full Coverage on Google News
description: WARSAW, Poland (AP) — U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris on Thursday embraced calls for an international war crimes investigation of Russia over its invasion of Ukraine, citing the “atrocities” of bombing civilians, <a href="U.S.
